text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: That should do it. I hope you'll take<n>good care of Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Of course. I'll give her all the support<n>she needs.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for such a sudden<n>request. I'll never forget the
kindness<n>you've shown me. Thank you so<n>much.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I certainly wanted to pursue our<n>dreams together, but these
things<n>happen. If this is what you want, then<n>that's the
end of it. I shall respect<n>your decision.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
As long as your passion remains,<n>you'll be victorious! Now,
make your<n>dreams come true with Team Sirius!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... It's nice to meet you all.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoooaaa! It's SUPER nice to meet<n>you too! You must be
pretty happy,<n>Spe! You're finally on the same team!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... I mean, I am excited, butnow that you say it out loud, it's kindof embarrassing...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Now that you're all introduced, let's<n>see how you run. Show
us a lap like<n>it's a real race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But don't think too hard about it. Just<n>do what we did
before—run how you<n>want.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But don't think too hard about it. Just<n>do what we did
before—run how you<n>want.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: How I want... Understood.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wow! That speed!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And she's still accelerating! Is she<n>gonna cross the finish
line like that?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka runs with such speed<n>that it takes
everyone's breath away.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha... Keeping that speed up the<n>whole lap would really
be something.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha... Keeping that speed up the<n>whole lap would really
be something.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... Heh...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You flew off like a rocket there. You<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You flew off like a rocket there. You<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm fine... My pace was terrible, and<n>my times were
probably all over the<n>place, but...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It felt... so good. So fun.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even as she struggles to catch her<n>breath, Silence
Suzuka's expression<n>is one of pure satisfaction. She's<n>
beaming with joy.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Just watching you is fun. Itseriously looked like you might crossthe finish line at full speed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, now we're one step closer<n>to finding your running
style! One more<n>lap!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I happened to catch a bit of your<n>training today. You were a
completely<n>different person from the girl locking<n>herself in
the library.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Wasn't it just awful? I wasn't<n>paying attention to my pace
or<n>anything. I just ran to my heart's<n>content.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I swear... If you know how bad it<n>looks, why are you all
smiles?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I mean, it's not like I'm doing it on<n>purpose... Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
All that studying for nothing... Yet for<n>some reason, the
scenery I seek has<n>never been more clear to me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: While your running is less refined, Iwill admit that I felt more threatened watching you thistime.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Although that doesn't mean I'm<n>planning to lose.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It's coming up, isn't it? The day we<n>finally compete.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Leading the pack is Silence Suzuka!<n>What a runaway! She's
entered the<n>homestretch with a substantial lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's passed the two-hundred-metermark in a flash! BUT WAIT! Lastyear's champion and the EmpressAir Groove have caught up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The two surge past Suzuka! They're<n>going head-to-head!
Who will come<n>out on top?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: From the outside by a hair, it's AirGroooove! Air Groove has takenfirst place in this G1 race!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Congrats on your first race with your<n>new team.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It would've been better if I could've<n>stayed in the lead the
whole time. Too<n>bad I got sixth.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But you looked like you were havingfun out there. Heck, you're stillsmiling.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But you looked like you were havingfun out there. Heck, you're stillsmiling.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
This running style is harder to win<n>with, but the view from
the front is so<n>beautiful...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you'll get an even prettier<n>view going forward.
You're just<n>brimming with passion, after all.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I'll be right there alongside you. I<n>can't wait to see the
day you finally<n>catch up to the scenery in your head.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I'll be right there alongside you. I<n>can't wait to see the
day you finally<n>catch up to the scenery in your head.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: When I finally catch up to the scenery<n>in my head...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Perhaps that moment is the sceneryyou want to see, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I can't really picture it right<n>now, but...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I can't really picture it right<n>now, but...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I can already tell it's going to be quite<n>a sight.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'll do whatever I can to make it<n>happen.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'll do whatever I can to make it<n>happen.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Understood.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I promise to give you the view that<n>you long for.
